website_summaries.verdict: A lush drop-in tub that gives you a touch of luxury in your day.
pros: Works well for smaller spaces such as compact apartments
cons: It could be larger for added comfort

customer_reviews.title: Great product but be careful about the images
customer_reviews.text: Great product but be careful about the images. The 2422V002.*** models just don't have the tile flange so they are primarily meant to be drop in tubs and not for alcove installation. It's still possible to install them in an alcove but requires extra care for water-proofing. Note that American Standard's own website has the incorrect pictures so I can't fault Amazon for it (you will notice that in at least one of the pictures the tub is shown with a small tile flange on 3 of the 4 sides - that's not going to be there so don't count on it).
customer_reviews.author: GadgetMan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE at first soak...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tub. Was limited by space and I'm not fond of jacuzzi style tubs. I'm 5'9" and I can totally fit under the water with just my head out without doing any weird yoga positioning of my legs. I opted for the thinner even thought I could fit the wider one due to being in the country and having limited hot water and on a well. It's faster to fill up. I love the look too.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this tub!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the size and shape, I am 6' tall and can still get my entire body submerged. The tub is very lightweight so I installed on a mortar bed with additional supports.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: TThis bathtub was build from cheap plastic. I stepped ...
customer_reviews.text: TThis bathtub was build from cheap plastic. I stepped in to take a shower and it cracks. Which cost me $250 to get it repaired. You can't get it clean to initial white color, no matter what cleaner you use. It absorbed all dirt and white color faded in weeks after installation. Cant return it because in molded in my ceramic bath and will cost me a lot of money to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: makdim

customer_reviews.title: Deep and Narrow, Beautiful with Armrests  GREAT DEAL for the $$
customer_reviews.text: We gutted our master bath and I wanted great tub. Tub arrived in a limp cardboard box with little packing, and the sides torn open. I thought for sure it was damaged. Fortunately it was not. Was installed with required tall drain/overflow. Beautiful. Please pay attention to the width measurements. This one is 6" more narrow than next model up. I honestly thought that by looking at it I might get stuck because it is so deep and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Wife

customer_reviews.title: It arrived two weeks quicker than the box store could provide and was in perfect condition! We are very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Who buys a tub from Amazon? Well, we did. It arrived two weeks quicker than the box store could provide and was in perfect condition! We are very pleased. I am 5'5.5" and can just barely straighten my legs completely as it is "short" inside but oh-so deep and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: K Obreque

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the tub
customer_reviews.text: The tub came with air bubbles. It's a nice tub, but sucks that came with air bubbles. The problem is I am doing construction and I needed my tub right away and now I have to reship back and get a new one. I can't really give a good review due this very strong problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom heartbreak
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a soaking tub but the length is not advertised accurately. I am 5’3” and this tub is too small for me to lay down and soak in. I am so disappointed in this product and I know that it will cost me so much more to have it removed and replaced. Heartbreaking after spending so much time looking before I purchased. The pictures do not depict how small the soaking part of the tub actually is. There is about a foot less than the 60” that is advertised
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.text: I already ordered to of this. The first one was ok until in went to install it. Then realized it had a chip on a corner. And second one I ordered came complete destroyed. Like if they send me back a damaged tub
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tub is not compatible with other than american standard drain fittings
customer_reviews.text: This tub is not compatible with other than american standard drain fittings etc. Please add to the price $100 more at least to get a right expensive part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A spa experience.
customer_reviews.text: Just had this installed, and I absolutely love the depth. I do ally made a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Wife loves this tub
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it! Great product for the price! Must buy matching American standard overflow for this tub though.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Smith

customer_reviews.title: Heaven.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Best purchase ever. I’m 5’9 and got the 32 in version. Amazingly comfortable and I was fully submerged 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. We're building a new home and have just had this tub installed. Hopefully next week we'll be in there and I'll be able to use it. It looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: Fhaley

customer_reviews.title: Its cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size. To me it seems bigger than 5ft.
customer_reviews.author: Jovan Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and value!! I can't wait to soak in this tub
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna Barton

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I am 5'6" and this fits perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I am 5'6" and this fits perfectly for a deep soak. Not totally submerged from neck down, but plenty deep for nice long soak.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cetola

customer_reviews.title: Super Soaking Tub
customer_reviews.text: Nice bathtub. No sharp edges as mentioned in other reviews. Arrived in perfect condition and well wrapped and boxed. Finish perfect. Don't see how it could be any better. It's a very nice deep tub. We chose a drop in style because it needs to be lifted off the floor so I can see out the windows. This is a renovation turning a stairwell into a master bath and closet.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lindsley

customer_reviews.title: Love this classic deep soak tub
customer_reviews.text: This American Standard tub is awesome. Going with the deep soak was perfect and it is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Diane A McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Great bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Great bathtub. Easy to install and very sturdy after installation. It is deeper than standard tubs and this is what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: nashuaNH

customer_reviews.title: Great tub but corners chipped
customer_reviews.text: This tub arrived as described and looked really great. I set it on a granite deck. The problem is that while setting it two corners chipped and I was being very carfull with it so not to damage the tub or granite. I was able to glue the peices back on and only I will know, but thought I would share.
customer_reviews.author: Vegasfive

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the same model in a larger size and it is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size on this tub and was lucky enough to notice that before it shipped. I ordered the same model in a larger size and it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and functionality and it was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: but it is so much nicer and looks beautiful. Can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: We are still in the process of putting this in - we are replacing our old garden tub, but it is so much nicer and looks beautiful. Can't wait to use it, but am very happy with the quality and it was delivered without any issues or damage. Beautiful tub!
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tub twice and both times it arrived chipped! I ordered it from another sauce.
customer_reviews.author: hope

customer_reviews.title: but the best thing that can be said
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it will hold water, but the best thing that can be said. They don't tell you that it is predrilled for a tiny faucet. And, it is BOWED. The ends of the tub rest on the tile decking but there's a1/4" - 3/8" gap I'm the middle. It will not lay flat on the tile decking. Really a pretty terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Baker

customer_reviews.title: How to buy a bath tub
customer_reviews.text: If you're building a house 12 miles from the nearest town of 1000 people, you might get lucky enough to find your bathtub on Amazon for a great price and free shipping. This is the deepest soaker I could find for any price, and the price is good! Can't wait to install it.
customer_reviews.author: The Scrivener

customer_reviews.title: I want to hop in so bad!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a higher end rental property. It looks so inviting. Since it is not installed yet I can not even give it a dry run. I know I will never have a chance to take a bath in THIS tub but I can't wait to sit down in it when it is installed. It looks like it would be so comfortable. I do plan on ordering the 72" for my own upcoming bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: great soaker tub
customer_reviews.text: I installed on of these tubs for my wife. She takes a bath about 5-6 times a week. This is the ONLY one that has a top mounted overflow drain to achieve great water depth. But make sure you have at least a 50 gallon water heater. We use a 65 gallon heater. My wife soaks up to her neck in comfort with this tub. You do need a special drain setup. It is worth the extra expense and it will last for ever. Easy to clean too !
customer_reviews.author: PETE

product_meta.title: American Standard 2422V002.011 Evolution 5 ft. x 32 in. Deep Soaking Tub with Reversible Drain, Arctic
product_meta.description: Color:Arctic WhiteDesigned to soothe at the end of the day, the evolution deep soaking tub from american standard is a luxurious 18 ½ in. Deep bathing pool that allows for total immersion and comfort. Featuring dual molded-in armrests, lumbar support and a safe, slip-resistant floor surface, evolution transforms everyday bathing into a relaxing spa experience.
feature_bullets: Deep and roomy for total body immersion and comfort
Requires Deep-Soak Max Drain 1599.205, sold separately
Durable brass Deep-Soak Max Drain, required, is a top-mount overflow allowing a 3" deeper water level than standard bath drains
Made of glossy acrylic with durable fiberglass reinforcement
Full coverage 18 ½ inch depth to overflow
Comfortable, wide contoured lumbar support and molded armrests

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars62 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
